__e: So, from one lonely queen to another, I ask that should anything happen to me, you will protect my child as your own.
Looking at these uptight people, I'd rather be on my boat with seagulls for company.
Which, as it turns out... Was the best thing that could have happened, really.
You know what will happen to me if I'm seen with you on my tail?
Think what'll happen to me if you don't get me out of this.
But I can't imagine what's going to happen to me, if I maybe come home in time to see in the New Year.
